name: AmbientNoise
0:
”Alexa open ambient noise”
”Alexa ask ambient noise to play for 30 minutes”
”Alexa stop”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: ambient noise
des:
Enhance sleep and focus with Ambient Noise! This dull sound will block out any distractions and soothe your soul. 

All you need to do is say Alexa start Ambient Noise, and she will play the track for 30 minutes. This is a perfect skill to use for relaxation and meditation, or to tune in and focus on your work.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
